##Task1
##Reading processing data
```{r}
expeditions <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-09-22/expeditions.csv')

library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library("viridis")
```

##Exploring data
```{r}
summary(expeditions)
theme_set(theme_light())
view(expeditions)
```

##Expeditions plot
```{r}
expeditions %>%
  mutate(peak_name = fct_lump(peak_name, n=15)) %>%
  filter(peak_name != 'Other') %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = peak_name, fill = season) +
  geom_bar(show.legend = TRUE, width = 0.5) +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")+
  scale_fill_viridis_d() +
  labs (y="Number of expeditions", x=NULL, 
        title="The 15 most popular peaks stacked by season of expedition") +
  coord_flip()
```

##Task2
##Reading processing data
```{r}
phd_field <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-02-19/phd_by_field.csv")
install.packages("RColorBrewer")
library(RColorBrewer)
display.brewer.all()
install.packages("scales")
library(scales)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
```

##Exploring data
```{r}
view(phd_field)
glimpse(phd_field)
summary(phd_field)


```

##Plots
```{r}
 phd_field %>%
  group_by(broad_field, year) %>%
  summarise(n_phds = sum(n_phds, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%

  ggplot() +
  aes(x = year, y = n_phds, color = broad_field) + 
  geom_line(size = 1.2) +
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = scale(pretty_breaks(5)) +
                     scale_y_continuous(labels = comma_format()) +
  theme_minimal() +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
    labels(x = NULL, y = NULL, 
           title = "Number of awarded Ph.D.-s in the US by year")
  

```

##Plots
```{r}

  group_by(state_abb,state_region)

state_commute <- commute %>% 
  group_by(state_abb,state_region) %>% 
  summarise(walk = sum(n[mode == 'Walk'],bike = sum(n[mode == 'Bike'], na.rm = TRUE), na.rm = TRUE))
  
 state_commute %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = "Walk", y = "Bike", color = state_region)+
  geom_point(size = 2, show.legend = TRUE) +
   labs(x = "Number of people walking to work (log N)", y = "Number of ppl biking to work (log N)", title = "Title Number of people walking vs. biking to work in each US state") +
```
